alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 2:58PM CDT until August 05 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sweet Home, or near Downtown Little Rock, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Wrightsville... Sweet Home... Estes... Toltec Mounds State Park... Scott... Baucum... Higgins... Willow Beach... Toltec... College Station... Terry Lock and Dam... Rose City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
